## Files.readJsonFileSync() function

Convenience function to read type-safe JSON from a file

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function readJsonFileSync(srcPath: string): Result<JsonValue>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  srcPath | string | Path of the file to read |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[JsonValue](./ts-json.jsonvalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with a [JsonValue](./ts-json.jsonvalue.md) or `Failure` with a message if an error occurs.
